 Water-resistant design with always-on Retina display.

name: Samsung Galaxy S21
description: Latest Samsung smartphone with high-end trending features including a 120Hz AMOLED display, Exynos 2100 processor, and a triple camera system. Includes 128GB storage and 8GB RAM. Barely used, in perfect condition with original packaging and accessories.

name: Sony WH-1000XM4
description: Industry-leading trending noise-cancelling over-ear headphones with up to 30 hours of battery life. Features adaptive sound control, speak-to-chat technology, and touch controls. Includes carrying case, charging cable, and audio cable for wired use.

name: Dell XPS 13
description: High-performance laptop with a sleek design, featuring an Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB RAM, and 512GB SSD. The 13.4-inch InfinityEdge display offers stunning 4K resolution. Perfect for professionals and students needing reliable computing power.

name: Nike Air Max 270
description: Stylish and comfortable sneakers with Nike's largest Air unit yet in the heel for maximum comfort. Features a breathable mesh upper and cushioned midsole. Worn only a few times, almost like new. Size US 10 men's.

name: Adidas Ultraboost
description: High-performance running shoes with trending responsive Boost midsole and Primeknit upper for adaptive support and comfort. Features Continental™ Rubber outsole for extraordinary grip. Perfect for long-distance running or casual wear. Size UK 9.

name: Ray-Ban Aviator Sunglasses
description: Classic aviator sunglasses with polarized lenses that reduce glare and enhance visual clarity. Features gold metal frames and green G-15 lenses. Includes original case and cleaning cloth. Authentic Ray-Ban product with UV protection.

name: Levi's 501 Original Fit Jeans
description: Classic straight leg denim jeans with button fly and five-pocket styling. Made from high-quality denim that gets better with age. Medium wash with slight fading for a vintage look. Size 32W x 32L. Only worn a few times.

name: Canon EOS R5
description: Professional-grade mirrorless camera with 45MP full-frame CMOS sensor and DIGIC X processor. Capable of 8K RAW video recording and 20fps continuous shooting. Includes dual card slots, 5-axis IBIS, and weather sealing. Comes with battery, charger, and 24-105mm lens.

name: GoPro HERO9
description: Versatile trending action camera for adventure enthusiasts with 5K video recording and 20MP photos. Includes waterproof case for underwater photography up to 33ft. Features HyperSmooth 3.0 stabilization, TimeWarp 3.0, and front display for vlogging. Perfect for travel, sports, and outdoor activities.

name: Bose SoundLink Revolve+
description: Premium portable Bluetooth speaker with 360° sound and deep, loud bass. Features water-resistant design, built-in microphone for calls, and up to 16 hours of battery life. Includes charging cradle and carrying handle for easy transport. Perfect for parties, outdoor gatherings, or home use.

name: Trending Apple iPad Pro 12.9
description: High-performance tablet with stunning Liquid Retina XDR display and M1 chip for laptop-level performance. Features 256GB storage, Face ID, and support for Apple Pencil and Magic Keyboard. Perfect for creative professionals, students, or entertainment. Includes charger and original box.

name: Fossil Men's Leather Wallet
description: Premium bifold leather wallet with RFID blocking technology to protect your cards from unauthorized scanning. Features 8 card slots, 2 bill compartments, and ID window. Made from genuine leather with contrast stitching. Perfect everyday wallet for the modern man.

name: Tiffany & Co. Diamond Engagement Ring
description: Stunning 1.2 carat diamond solitaire ring-3 set in platinum. Features Tiffany's signature six-prong setting that maximizes the diamond's brilliance. Diamond is VS1 clarity with E color grade. Includes original blue box, certificate of authenticity, and receipt. Perfect for a special proposal.

name: The Lord of the Rings Trilogy Box Set
description: Complete hardcover box set of J.R.R. Tolkien's epic fantasy masterpiece. This special collector's edition includes all three volumes (The Fellowship of the Ring, The Two Towers, and The Return of the King) with original dust jackets and a foldout map of Middle-earth. Perfect condition, never read.

name: IKEA MALM Queen Bed Frame
description: Minimalist Scandinavian design bed frame with clean lines and wood veneer finish. Features adjustable bed sides to allow use of mattresses of different heights. Includes slatted bed base for added comfort. Purchased last year and in excellent condition. Disassembled for easy transport.

name: Dyson V11 Cordless Vacuum
description: Powerful cordless vacuum with intelligent suction optimization and up to 60 minutes of run time. Features LCD screen that displays remaining run time and performance, HEPA filtration, and multiple cleaning attachments. Perfect for all floor types and pet hair. Includes wall-mounted dock and charger.

name: SK-II Facial Treatment Essence
description: Luxury skincare product containing over 90% Pitera, a bio-ingredient rich in vitamins, minerals, and amino acids that promotes skin's natural renewal process. Helps improve skin texture, reduce dark spots, and enhance radiance. 230ml bottle, used only twice. Authentic product purchased from Sephora.

name: Peloton Exercise Bike
description: Premium stationary exercise bike with 22-inch HD touchscreen for streaming live and on-demand classes. Features adjustable seat and handlebars, silent belt drive, and magnetic resistance for smooth, quiet workouts. Includes cleats for clip-in pedals and heart rate monitor. Used for only 6 months.

name: LEGO Star Wars Millennium Falcon
description: Massive 7,541-piece collector's edition of the iconic Star Wars spacecraft. Features detailed exterior and interior, including the cockpit, main hold, and gunner stations. Includes minifigures of Han Solo, Chewbacca, Princess Leia, and more. Assembled once and displayed in smoke-free home.

name: Michelin All-Season Tires Set of 4
description: Premium all-season tires with excellent wet and dry traction, comfortable ride, and long tread life. Size 225/65R17, perfect for SUVs and crossovers. Used for only 5,000 miles before upgrading vehicle. Tread depth is approximately 9/10ths of original. Great value for high-quality tires.

name: MacBook Pro 16-inch 2021
description: Apple MacBook Pro with M1 Pro chip, 16GB RAM, and 512GB SSD. Features a stunning 16-inch Liquid Retina XDR display, 10-core CPU, and 16-core GPU. Includes MagSafe charging, HDMI port, and SD card slot. Like new condition with original packaging.

name: Vintage Vinyl Record Collection
description: Collection of 50+ classic rock vinyl records from the 60s and 70s including The Beatles, Led Zeppelin, Pink Floyd, and The Rolling Stones. All in good to excellent condition with original sleeves. Perfect for collectors or music enthusiasts looking to start a vinyl collection.

name: Herman Miller Aeron Chair
description: Ergonomic office chair with PostureFit SL back support, adjustable arms, and tilt mechanism. Size B (medium) in graphite color. Purchased 1 year ago and in excellent condition. Perfect for home office or professional workspace.

name: DJI Mavic Air 2 Drone
description: Compact drone with 4K/60fps video, 48MP photos, and 34-minute flight time. Features 3-axis gimbal, obstacle avoidance sensors, and intelligent shooting modes. Includes controller, extra batteries, carrying case, and ND filters. Used only a handful of times.

name: Nintendo Switch OLED
description: Latest Nintendo Switch console with vibrant OLED display, enhanced audio, and 64GB internal storage. Includes original box, dock, Joy-Cons, and charger. Barely used, perfect for gaming on the go or at home.

name: Patagonia Down Sweater Jacket
description: Lightweight, windproof, and water-resistant down jacket. Features 800-fill-power Advanced Global Traceable Down, zippered handwarmer pockets, and adjustable hem. Size M, navy blue. Worn only a few times.

name: KitchenAid Stand Mixer
description: Classic 5-quart tilt-head stand mixer in Empire Red. Includes flat beater, dough hook, wire whip, and pouring shield. Perfect for baking and cooking enthusiasts. Lightly used, excellent condition.

name: Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Gen)
description: Wireless noise-cancelling earbuds with MagSafe charging case. Features active noise cancellation, transparency mode, and adaptive EQ. Includes original box and accessories. Used for a week.

name: Canon EF 50mm f/1.8 STM Lens
description: Prime lens for Canon DSLR cameras. Fast f/1.8 aperture, compact design, and smooth autofocus. Includes lens caps and original box. Perfect for portraits and low-light photography.

name: Fitbit Charge 5
description: Advanced fitness tracker with built-in GPS, heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, and stress management tools. Includes original band and charger. Used for one month.

name: The North Face Borealis Backpack
description: Durable 28L backpack with FlexVent suspension system, padded laptop sleeve, and multiple compartments. Black color, gently used, no rips or stains.

name: Samsung 32" Curved Monitor
description: Full HD 32-inch curved monitor with 75Hz refresh rate and HDMI connectivity. Great for gaming or productivity. Includes stand and power cable.

name: GoPro Chest Mount Harness
description: Adjustable chest mount harness for GoPro cameras. Ideal for hands-free POV footage during sports and adventures. Barely used, includes original packaging.

name: Sony PlayStation 5 DualSense Controller
description: Wireless controller for PlayStation 5 with haptic feedback and adaptive triggers. White color, lightly used, includes USB-C cable.

name: Columbia Men's Hiking Boots
description: Waterproof hiking boots with Omni-Grip traction and Techlite cushioning. Size US 11, brown color. Used for one hiking trip, excellent condition.

name: Dyson Pure Cool Link Air Purifier
description: Wi-Fi enabled air purifier and fan with HEPA filter. Removes 99.97% of allergens and pollutants. Includes remote control and original box.

name: Garmin Forerunner 245 Music
description: GPS running smartwatch with music storage, heart rate monitoring, and advanced training features. Black color, includes charger and extra band.

name: Logitech MX Master 3 Mouse
description: Advanced wireless mouse with ergonomic design, ultra-fast scrolling, and customizable buttons. Compatible with Mac and Windows. Includes USB-C charging cable.

name: Uniqlo Ultra Light Down Vest
description: Packable down vest, lightweight and warm. Size L, black color. Barely worn, no stains or tears.

name: Apple Magic Keyboard
description: Wireless Bluetooth keyboard with rechargeable battery and low-profile keys. Compatible with Mac, iPad, and iPhone. Includes original box and cable.

name: Lululemon Align Yoga Pants
description: High-rise, buttery-soft yoga pants. Size S, black. Worn twice, like new. Perfect for yoga, gym, or lounging.

name: Kindle Paperwhite (10th Gen)
description: Waterproof e-reader with 8GB storage and built-in adjustable light. Includes original box and charging cable. Excellent condition.

name: Fender Player Stratocaster
description: Electric guitar with maple neck, 3 single-coil pickups, and classic sunburst finish. Includes gig bag and strap. Lightly played, no scratches.

name: Instant Pot Duo 7-in-1
description: Multi-use programmable pressure cooker, 6-quart capacity. Functions as pressure cooker, slow cooker, rice cooker, steamer, sauté, yogurt maker, and warmer. Includes accessories and recipe book.

name: Samsung Galaxy Buds2
description: Wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation and ambient sound mode. Includes charging case and extra ear tips. Used for a week.

name: Razer BlackWidow V3 Mechanical Keyboard
description: RGB mechanical gaming keyboard with tactile green switches. Includes wrist rest and original box. Used for a month.

name: Le Creuset Dutch Oven 5.5qt
description: Enameled cast iron Dutch oven in Marseille blue. Perfect for soups, stews, and baking bread. Includes lid, gently used.

name: JBL Flip 5 Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable waterproof speaker with 12 hours of playtime. Black color, includes charging cable and original box.

name: Monopoly Classic Board Game
description: Family board game, complete set with all pieces and instructions. Box has minor wear, game components in excellent condition.
